titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry Exhibits at Edmond Historical Society

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue and red on light yellow) announcing The Grand Ole Opry, a series of exhibits featuring live concerts, film screenings, and programs at the Edmond Historical Society and Museum, during Summer 2006, from June 8 to October 10. Poster features the list of events and a woodcut of a cowboy boot.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
